title: Secret of the Pendulum-Wendy99
description:
Wendy99 PRESENTS :::::::

:::: Secret of the Pendulum :::

::Information::

Year: 2015
Genre: Adventure
Developer: Games Cofe
Published: BigFish
Platform: PC
Publication Type: Informal
Language: English
Voice set Language: English
Tablet: None

Join our heroines Lily and Madison as they follow a series of clues about a recent
string of chilling murders. Only with your help, will they be able to solve these
murders, catch the perpetrator and bring him to justice. Journey through this
thrilling story-driven game and gather all the clues.

Enjoy beautifully hand crafted scenes.
Investigate crimes scenes.
Engaging and secretive characters.

::System Requirements::

OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
CPU: 1.6 GHz
RAM: 2048 MB
DirectX: 9.0
Hard Drive: 500 MB
Browser: Internet Explorer 7 or later

::INSTALL AND PLAY
